00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 
00003 Author: Julie Betlach
00004 
00005 Adapted from code written by: Terry Caton, tcaton(a)hotmail.com
00006 Project Webpage: http://cajun-jsonapi.sourceforge.net/
00007 
00008 Original code parsed files in json format.
00009 Code now parses files in PDI format for a project for Washington University, 
00010 course CSE 533S: Pattern Oriented Software Design and Development, Summer 2009.
00011 
00012 functions: PDI_cast
00013 
00014 PDI_cast is intended as a alternatives to static_cast and dynamic_cast. The
00015 symantics are identical: one can cast a const/nonconst pointer/reference, and 
00016 all conventional rules regarding casting are preserved. It is similar to 
00017 static_cast in that it simply returns a "reinterpretation" of the pointer or
00018 reference passed in. However, it is closer in functionality to dynamic_cast,
00019 in that it verifies the operation is legal, and fails otherwise (returns null
00020 during pointer cast, throws PDI::Exception during reference cast). Examples:
00021 
00022 Number num = Number();
00023 const Element& el = num; // implicit cast
00024 
00025 PDI_cast<const Number&>(el); // runtime success
00026 PDI_cast<const Array&>(el); // runtime exception
00027 
00028 PDI_cast<Number&>(el); // compile time failure (loses const qualifier)
00029 PDI_cast<const Number*>(el); // compile time failure (cannot convert ref to pointer)
00030 
00031 ******************************************************************************/
00032 
00033 #pragma once
00034 
00035 
00036 namespace PDI
00037 {
00038 
00039 
00040 class Element;
00041 
00042 // reference to non-const
00043 template <typename ElementTypeQualifiedT>
00044 ElementTypeQualifiedT PDI_cast(Element& element);
00045 
00046 // reference to const
00047 template <typename ElementTypeQualifiedT>
00048 ElementTypeQualifiedT PDI_cast(const Element& element);
00049 
00050 // pointer to non-const
00051 template <typename ElementTypeQualifiedT>
00052 ElementTypeQualifiedT PDI_cast(Element* pElement);
00053 
00054 // pointer to const
00055 template <typename ElementTypeQualifiedT>
00056 ElementTypeQualifiedT PDI_cast(const Element* pElement);
00057 
00058 } // End namespace
00059 
00060 #include "cast.inl"
